alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 5:33AM MST until November 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing drizzle expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches. Ice accumulation of a light glaze with freezing drizzle. * WHERE...Osburn, Wallace, Fourth Of July Pass, Mullan, St. Maries, Sandpoint, Kellogg, Lookout Pass, Eastport, Pinehurst, Bonners Ferry, Priest River, Athol, Fernwood, Schweitzer Mountain Road, and Dobson Pass. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will fall as snow through Tuesday evening and then transition to freezing drizzle late Tuesday into Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
